thread.title: Kevin Durant And Russell Westbrook Team Up For Alley-Oop At All-Star Game And Celebrate With Each Other On The Sidelines
thread.title_full: Kevin Durant And Russell Westbrook Team Up For Alley-Oop At All-Star Game And Celebrate With Each Other On The Sidelines

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Kevin Durant And Russell Westbrook Team Up For Alley-Oop At All-Star Game And Celebrate With Each Other On The Sidelines
text:
Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant have finally acknowledged each other’s existence this all-star weekend. During tonight’s all-star game, Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook teamed up for this alley-oop dunk. 
Durant and Westbrook were all smiles on the sideline after the dunk
